channel.title: Weird java error when i run moparscape?
channel.description:
ok when i run moparscape this comes up! (look a pic below)
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/6836/errorfz1.png[/img][/URL]
i used to play moparscape always :D but i got a virus on my comp from a pop up, then i got my computer reset (everything whiped) then i downloaded moparscape and now that dumb error

item.title: Weird java error when i run moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @O0_dharok_00 O0 dharok 00
item.description:
@O0_dharok_00 wrote:

nope im still getting the same error that i got b4, i got another error last time saying this path is not specified.

and i edited my run mopar.bat to see what it sed

it said this “@echo off
title Running Bot
java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar;./HybridScape; Bot 0
::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem
pause”[br][size=1]Posted at: September 18, 2006, 01:07:40 PM[/size][hr]do i need to have a special thing? like WinRar? or umm do i need to edit the path where i right click my comp, advanced and so on?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 18, 2006, 01:10:30 PM[/size][hr]heeelppp plz

item.title: Weird java error when i run moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @O0_dharok_00 O0 dharok 00
item.source: Weird java error when i run moparscape?

item.title: Weird java error when i run moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Flying-Turtle-Assass Flying-Turtle-Assassin
item.description:
@Flying-Turtle-Assass wrote:

Ok well do this
Open a new notepad Document and place this code inside it.

@echo off
COLOR 08
title Testscape Client
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m server
pause

Then Save that notepad file as Compile.bat

ok. have fun, Hoped that Helped xD

Read full topic

item.description:
@O0_dharok_00 wrote:

ok thnx, but when i open my moparscape v3.1 folder
i dont have a compile.bat (and im ment to)
i have compile-classes.bat (is that still the same?) and ye it helped

item.source: Weird java error when i run moparscape?

item.title: Weird java error when i run moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Flying-Turtle-Assass Flying-Turtle-Assassin
item.description:
@Flying-Turtle-Assass wrote:

Ok mate, i know your prob lol i spent 1 hour 30 minutes my mate trying to explain Me = NUB!
now what you need to do is go to your java folder you have verison. 05 right, so if you know what your version is theres no need to go to your folder. Now then edit your compile.bat folder.(Right click, Edit) Should open notepad you will see something like this

@echo off
COLOR 08
title Testscape Client
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m server
pause

In that code i have version 07.
now in your case you would have to change your code to this

@echo off
COLOR 08
title Testscape Client
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m server
pause

Now hope that helped mate, Have fun XD

item.title: Weird java error when i run moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Flying-Turtle-Assass Flying-Turtle-Assassin
item.description:
@Flying-Turtle-Assass wrote:

You need to change the paths in your compile.bat to where they are in your java folders, make sure you have the latest edition of java downloaded(jdk) and that should sort out your problem
